About Me

I am an undergraduate student at School of Information, Renmin University of China. I joined the Beijing Key Laboratory of Big Data Management and Analysis Methods(BDAI) in May 2020 and I am supervised by Prof. Jun Xu.

Education Background

Sep. 2018 ~ Now: B.S. in School of Information, Renmin University of China.
